title: This is a delightful old colonial villa - LIP 092
details: LIP-092 This delightful old colonial villa has recently been refurbished to its former glory. Situated on a quiet residential road in Ahangama and only 100m from the beach and the coast road. Extending to 8500 Sq ft the villa has five en-suite bedrooms, three with private courtyards, plus a huge master suite occupying the whole of the top floor with an open bathroom. In addition, there are several reception rooms, a modern kitchen, an internal courtyard with fish pond, separate staff facilities and driver accommodation. The extensive front garden has a wonderful artistic pool with several areas to relax and rejuvenate in the tranquil surrounding. This villa is complete and is move in ready, either for a wonderful family home, or a very up market guest house.
